description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，曾任长春市人民政府市长。因2018年长春长生疫苗事件被要求引咎辞职。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and former Mayor of the Changchun Municipal People's Government. He was asked to resign in 2018 due to the Changsheng vaccine scandal.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

en: Changchun Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

nodes.id: 中共中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 吉林长春长生公司问题疫苗案件

description.zh-cn: 2018年，长春长生生物科技有限责任公司被发现其狂犬病疫苗生产记录造假以及百白破疫苗不符合标准的事件，引发公众对疫苗安全的担忧。
description.en: In 2018, Changchun Changsheng Bio-technology was found to have fabricated production records for its rabies vaccine and produced substandard DPT vaccines, sparking public concern over vaccine safety.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘长龙的前任长春市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Liu Changlong's predecessor as Mayor of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘长龙的继任长春市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Liu Changlong's successor as Mayor of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙是吉林公主岭人。
description.en: Liu Changlong is from Gongzhuling, Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liu Changlong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙是东北师范大学的校友。
description.en: Liu Changlong is an alumnus of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙于2013年3月至2016年9月期间，先后担任吉林省财政厅厅长、党组副书记，以及厅长、党组书记。
description.en: From March 2013 to September 2016, Liu Changlong served successively as Director and Deputy Party Group Secretary, and then Director and Party Group Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Department of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 2016年9月，刘长龙任中共长春市委副书记。
description.en: In September 2016, Liu Changlong was appointed Deputy Secretary of the Changchun Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙自2016年9月起任长春市代市长，同年10月正式当选市长，直至2018年8月辞职。
description.en: Liu Changlong served as acting mayor of Changchun from September 2016, was formally elected mayor in October of the same year, and held the post until his resignation in August 2018.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，刘长龙当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Liu Changlong was elected as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 因对吉林长春长生公司问题疫苗案件负有责任，刘长龙被中共中央政治局常务委员会要求引咎辞职，其中断了其市长任期。
description.en: Due to his responsibility in the Jilin Changchun Changsheng company problematic vaccine case, Liu Changlong was required by the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee to resign, cutting short his term as mayor.

relationships.source: 中共中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常务委员会于2018年8月16日召开会议，要求对长春长生疫苗事件负有责任的刘长龙引咎辞职。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee held a meeting on August 16, 2018, and required Liu Changlong, who was held responsible for the Changsheng vaccine incident, to resign.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙接替姜治莹出任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Liu Changlong succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Mayor of Changchun Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 刘忻接替因疫苗案件引咎辞职的刘长龙出任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Liu Xin succeeded Liu Changlong, who resigned due to the vaccine scandal, as the Mayor of Changchun Municipal People's Government.
